class.name: RenderSceneDataRD
class.brief_description: Render scene data implementation for the RenderingDevice based renderers.
class.description: Object holds scene data related to rendering a single frame of a viewport. See also [RenderSceneData], [RenderData], and [RenderDataRD]. [b]Note:[/b] This is an internal rendering server object. Do not instantiate this class from a script.
